website_summaries.verdict: The unlocked Huawei Honor 6X phone offers a lot of Android bang for your buck, besting last year's model in just about every way.
pros: Fingerprint sensor, dual SIM slots, and expandable storage

customer_reviews.title: great phone love it bought a second hand iPhone 6 ...
customer_reviews.text: great phone love it bought a second hand iPhone 6 volume on calls was rubbish so got rid and got this phone instead in my opinion a far better phone with a cheap price tag
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Susan Codd

customer_reviews.title: These are Brilliant if you want Android, look no further..
customer_reviews.text: For the money, incredible..my daughter put me on to this brand a year ago, we have 3 of them now...all the Android you need for 2 hundred quid or there abouts..including finger print ID for security. Bargain...no more rip off contract phones for me..just buy one of these every year or so as required and a SIM only deal with whoever you fancy...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best phone I have ever bought
customer_reviews.text: Best phone I have ever bought. Minimum bloatware. Excellent battery. I top it up for an hour every 4 days and that's with regular use. This IS a dual sim phone
customer_reviews.author: Mr. P. Creedy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value.
customer_reviews.text: My opinion us that it's the best you can get for the price. With one caveat...you cannot use a small flash usb dongle (to store or play vids). The phone can't see it.
customer_reviews.author: A. T. Howard

customer_reviews.title: It's one of the good!
customer_reviews.text: It's the second honor I have. Never disappointed. If someone is looking for a good compromise between quality, performance and price, this is the phone!

customer_reviews.title: I so love my new phone it has everything on it and ...
customer_reviews.text: I so love my new phone it has everything on it and more will recommend it too other people and worth the price .

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Love this phone, working well so far, camera takes incredibly good pictures up close not so much for far away pictures

customer_reviews.title: Feels great for the money
customer_reviews.text: Feels great for the money, battery life is unbelievable on the first day and phone performing quickly. Let's see how it lasts.

customer_reviews.title: Pleased.
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased. Lovely phone. Had it a few months now and no issues.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Phone was pre-charged and worked a dream. Sim worked when inserted.
customer_reviews.author: A E Jude

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money works very well nicely looking phone ...
customer_reviews.text: Great value for money works very well nicely looking phone very good battery life camera also good ring tones could be better charge port bit flimsy overall i would highly recommend this phone
customer_reviews.author: sunny

customer_reviews.title: Watch out apple!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow fantastic phone so fast and honor will be taking over every main brand soon...ie Samsung apple
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: has issues
customer_reviews.text: I have a basic use for mobile phones, taking pictures, sending texts, checking emails, and facebook.The first problem with the phone is notifications, they dont appear on your home screen, you have to swipe down and then unlock the phone to view them, i even tried a third party notification app and that didnt work either so i emailed the company and got no reply.When taking videos and zooming in or out the camera loses its focus and images become blurred.Battery life was good, the phone is very heavy and reminiscent in a way of the good old fashioned brick mobile, the installed ram does ensure there is no slow down in operations however.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WORST BATTERY LIFE EVER!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this phone. On the surface, the phone sounds to good to be true, that is because it is! I've had this phone less than 6 months and from 100 percent to the phone shutting itself down due to no power takes less than 1 hour. I've hardly used the phone vigorously at all, just basics. This is completely unacceptable. I urge you not to buy this phone
customer_reviews.author: Calum Finlay

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product from Huawei(wahway)!!!
customer_reviews.text: Lovely camera would have been better if they had left you 2 separate compartments for sims and external micro sd like the 5x had but I am being picky as this is so much more than the 5x really fast with the extra ram and 32 gb of storage and quite remarkable value for money!!!☺
customer_reviews.author: bazzer

customer_reviews.title: Overall a good phone
customer_reviews.text: Good phone for the money, it's more fragile than I would've liked but does survive everyday useage. I'm still not sure why it has two rear cameras though. It's pretty powerful and has a nice display. The screen protector that came on it didn't cover the whole screen which was a bit worrying. Also the figer print reader is aswome and quick at recogining you.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone, Fantastic price.  All Pros & No Cons
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Phone which offer lots of features, Finger print scanner is excellent & apps are fantastic. Has everything you would expect from the high end phones. Very Fast & plenty of storage. I would fully recommend it to anyone wanting to upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Great phone for the price
customer_reviews.text: I can only repeat what others have said; it's a fantastic phone, especially for the price. It has all the features that you would expect from a high end handset and is only let down by the very poor launcher. Endless homescreens due to the lack of an app draw? A very poor decision. Easily fixed though by downloading google now or nova launcher. Official fix Will come with Android 7 update at some point.
customer_reviews.author: J. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: It overheats when using GPS or videochat. Really bad signal reception
customer_reviews.text: The device looks nice and at the beginning it worked as expected. After some weeks using it I have noticed it overheats when the GPS is being used, or when using videochat. It's something that worries me, because reaching that temperature doesn't seem safe. Also, signal reception is not the best and I experience no signal in places where my company phone works perfectly (same network) I'm returning the device
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quite good
customer_reviews.text: Like the phone really easy to use but took a star off due to unable to connect to Fitbit as it seems as though it has Bluetooth issues, upon googling I don't seem to be alone in this
customer_reviews.author: kjt9502

customer_reviews.title: Nice smartphone, good clear screen
customer_reviews.text: Nice smartphone, good clear screen, sharp photos, does everything that I want. I can even make 'phone calls with it!
customer_reviews.author: S. Cannon

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: Wanting a smartphone but unwilling to pay ludicrous amounts for it, I did a little bit of research and this phone came up. Camera was rated well too, and I'm happy with it. Reviews go on about branding and ergonomic details I couldn't care less about, if you don't either, I would highly recommend this phone.
customer_reviews.author: J. W. E. Dawson

customer_reviews.title: ... buy Samsung or htc not anymore this is an excellent
customer_reviews.text: Used to buy Samsung or htc not anymore this is an excellent phone
customer_reviews.author: gerald malloch

customer_reviews.title: One occasion where internet research paid off.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I smugly laugh at people who buy Apple at ridiculous prices
customer_reviews.author: mr jeremy parry

customer_reviews.title: love the finger print scanner.
customer_reviews.text: Got this after my Iphone 6 plus went crazy.. and needed a new cheap phone for the time being.. but i've still got it almost 6 months later.. not missed the Iphone at all and i love the finger print scanner.. works faster than the iphones.. the rest is vanilla android, love that rather than having a skin overlayed. All seems to work very well and not had any slowdowns at all.. The processor seems very fast and will play everygame and keeps every app running at the speed you need.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Wills

customer_reviews.title: Great piece of kit.
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone! What can I say, it is almost as good as my beloved Note 3. It's fast, has lots of space and takes decent photos and doesn't have a lot of apps I'm unlikely to use.
customer_reviews.author: AthenaNI

customer_reviews.title: BIG phone...BIG performance
customer_reviews.text: Have just upgraded from a Huawei Ascend 300. The Honor 6X is a BIG phone so if you want something to fit unobtrusively into the back pocket of tight jeans look elsewhere. It didn't come loaded with bloatware and it is easy to uninstall unwanted apps. The supplied charging lead was not a good fit at the phone end so I'm using the lead from my old phone. It was really easy to set up using the online manual. Given the price I'm really pleased with what it offers..large memory...good camera....clear display...intuitive use.
customer_reviews.author: rayc

customer_reviews.title: who spent a while researching the best budget phones
customer_reviews.text: bought this for my teen son, who spent a while researching the best budget phones, and I must say, I'm very impressed with Honor 6X, looks even better than my IPhone 6. Looking at the futures it has, it is more powerful and at a fraction of apple phone prices. If haven't got one, definitely, would be my choise. Ordered on Sunday, was delivered Wednesday to Ireland. All in all, the best phone at this price, and it is dual sim, so handy while on holidays to avoid roaming charges.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Phone
customer_reviews.text: This is a oneplus 3 clone which is almost half the price with a better battery and very good camera! Although the processor speed isn't as fast as some of the more expensive phones it does not make any difference when you're web browsing, emailing, Facebook etc. The phone is fast where it matters. Really excellent phone! Better than phones costing 2x as much!
customer_reviews.author: mrpete

customer_reviews.title: Better if I update this review in a month's time
customer_reviews.text: Still getting used to using. If anything, there's too much choice of things to do. Seems to do what I want. Better if I update this review in a month's time.
customer_reviews.author: Lord Boomy

customer_reviews.title: - Great value for money - Fast responses of the user ...
customer_reviews.text: Pros: - Great value for money - Fast responses of the user interface - No technical hiccups, works very well - Great signal reception (as good as iPhone in my location) - Comes with a cover for the screen (one less thing to worry about) - Fits into my hands nicely - Nicely looking phone Cans - None so far, but well - I was expecting a medium class phone for reasonable money, not a rock star - Just one maybe - the gold version still has a white cover on the front side
customer_reviews.author: PetrB

customer_reviews.title: Not the sturdiest device
customer_reviews.text: Even with a tempered glass protector, one drop caused the glass underneath it to crack. Definitely not the sturdiest device out there.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer
